Class CommandRepository

java.lang.Object
com.scivicslab.pluggablecli.CommandRepository
public class CommandRepository extends Object
Central registry for CLI command definitions and their execution logic.

Unlike the original Utility-cli CommandRepository which stored commands across four parallel TreeMaps, this implementation consolidates all command metadata into a single TreeMap<String, CommandDefinition>.

Category descriptions are kept in a separate map because they are not 1:1 with commands.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    CommandRepository()
    Default constructor initializes universal options with a -h/--help flag.

      public org.apache.commons.cli.CommandLine parse(String[] args) throws org.apache.commons.cli.ParseException
      Parses the given command-line arguments and extracts the specified command. Also detects -h/--help flags and sets isHelpRequested().
      Parameters:
      args - the command-line arguments
      Returns:
      the parsed CommandLine object, or null if args is empty
      Throws:
      org.apache.commons.cli.ParseException - if command-line parsing fails
